customer_reviews.text: Seems to get the chlorine out, but doesn't lather as much as expected. Smells great, but seems to be on the expensive side.

customer_reviews.title: Good shampoo.

customer_reviews.title: Leaves too much buildup!!
customer_reviews.text: This product left serious buildup in my kids’ hair. They liked the smell and doesn’t sting in their eyes, so that is good but as for removing chlorine and leaving hair clean — I would choose another product!

customer_reviews.text: My daughter struggled with scalp buildup and this shampoo solved it

customer_reviews.title: kind of like eating the inside of a banana peel
customer_reviews.text: Can't really be sure if it does what it's supposed to. Strange feeling to lather, kind of like eating the inside of a banana peel. Oddly, the shampoo even smells a little like banana cotton candy.

customer_reviews.title: This is the best "after swim" soap I've found.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best "after swim" soap I've found. Gentle/mild and yet very effective at washing away chlorine. Highly recommended.

product_meta.title: Babo Botanicals Purifying Swim & Sport 2-in-1 Shampoo & Wash with Natural Cucumber and Aloe Vera, Vegan, for Babies, Kids or Sensitive Skin - 16 oz.
product_meta.description: Size:16 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)Babo Botanicals Swim & Sport Shampoo & Wash is a multi-purpose formula designed to cleanse and purify your baby or kid’s hair, scalp and skin. Specifically formulated with a corn-derived chelator to remove chlorine and dirt after play time at the pool, playground or beach. Our 2-in-1 hydrating cleanser is gentle enough for babies, but effective enough for all ages. This shampoo and body wash is developed with plant-based ingredients including moisturizing Shea and Cocoa Butter to replenish and hydrate your hair, leaving it smooth and shiny. Natural aloe vera and cucumber provide additional nourishment of the skin and scalp as well as a refreshing, invigorating scent. Enriched with Babo's exclusive, organic Nutri-Soothe Complex. This formula is sulfate-free and meets EWG VERIFIED criteria, making it safe for everyday use. Tear-free. Made in the USA and B Corp Certified. To use, wash hair and body thoroughly after pool, beach or active play. Follow with Swim & Sport Conditioner and/or Detangling Spray for complete hydration.
